name: Bruno Bernardino
content:
This is the most recent post of all.

Showing off my cooking skills.

name: Bruno Bernardino
content:
I find your lack of faith disturbing. No! Alderaan is peaceful.

We have no weapons. You can't possibly...

Obi-Wan is here. The Force is with him.

name: Bruno Bernardino
content:
What!? Don't act so surprised, Your Highness.

You weren't on any mercy mission this time. Several transmissions were beamed to this ship by Rebel spies. I want to know what happened to the plans they sent you. She must have hidden the plans in the escape pod. Send a detachment down to retrieve them, and see to it personally, Commander.

There'll be no one to stop us this time!

name: Bruno Bernardino
content:
The Force is strong with this one.

I have you now. He is here. I want to come with you to Alderaan. There's nothing for me here now.
